title: Party Leaders reach consensus on 21A
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Prime Minister’s Media office stated that after convening a second round of discussions with Party Leaders regarding the 21st Amendment to the Constitution, a general consensus was reached between all Parties regarding several key points.
However, the 21st amendment may be subject to revisions based on the Supreme Court determination in regards to the Samagi Jana Balawegaya constitutional amendment as well, the PM’s office added.
Doctor pleads guilty for 2018 Accident that killed Police Officer; Ordered to pay Rs. 10 Mn to family
